content.developer: BFFs Retro Time Travel Fashion was developed by Fabbox Studios.

fullContent: Home› GirlBFFs Retro Time Travel FashionBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenIf you love retro fashion, this is the perfect game for you. BFFs Retro Time Travel Fashion is your time machine ticket to an exciting fashion adventure. Join four stylish besties as they travel through time, facing the challenge of nailing iconic looks from the past. The catch? Every time you press the button on the time machine, one of the girls gets whisked away to a random era. And it’s up to YOU to make sure she’s dressed to impress!Wondering how to play? It's a piece of cake. Just use your mouse or tap if you’re on your phone. Choose a girl, hit the time machine button to find out where she's landed, and then pick out some clothes, hair, and accessories that scream the era. Once you've got one girl sorted, send the next one time-traveling. Keep going until all four are dressed to kill in their respective times.ControlsUse your mouse or tap to playOther Fashion GamesDress-up games provide a stylish way to explore fashion history and let your imagination run wild. Plus, they are perfect to kill some time casually. So, if you enjoyed this game, feel free to explore the entire collection at OnlineGames.io for more online fashion games. Get creative and discover how a girl can become a trendsetter with the power of fashion!A Summary of Fashion Over the DecadesBFFs Retro Time Travel Fashion is a dress up game where you’re not just picking outfits; you're diving into the fashion history books. Discover all from the pastel perfection of the 1950s to the neon explosion of the 1980s. You’ll need to bring your A game to pull together the perfect look for each girl. Every click on the time machine button sends a girl into one of these fabulous decades:1950s: Classic EleganceAh, the 50s, where every outfit says "classy"! Picture yourself in a chic polka dot dress, a cute cardigan draped over your shoulders, and soft victory rolls in your hair. It’s the epitome of ladylike charm. If you’re aiming for that retro, sophisticated vibe, this era is your playground. Just don’t forget the pearls, because no 50s look is complete without a touch of vintage glamour!1960s: Bold and BeautifulOh, 60s... where everything is big, bold, and beautiful. Think bright mini dresses with funky patterns and hair that reach for the sky in a sleek bouffant. The accessories? Think oversized sunglasses and chunky necklaces to match the colorful vibe. The 60s weren’t just about fashion; it was all about making a statement.1970s: Boho DreamsIf you're a free spirit at heart, the 70s were made for you. This era is all about flowy, bohemian hippie vibes think bell-bottoms, loose blouses, and earthy tones that scream “peace and love.” Feathered hair, flower crowns, and floral patterns are all part of the groovy mix. So, if you’re in the mood for some laid-back styling with a dash of hippie flair, the 70s will have you dancing in no time.1980s: Power and PopThe 80s were as loud as they were bold, and the fashion followed suit. Neon colors, oversized jackets, and the most voluminous hair you could possibly imagine—this era wasn’t about blending in, it was all about standing out. Accessories like fingerless gloves, bright headbands, and chunky earrings took the outfit to a whole new level. If you’re ready to bring the drama and fun, the 80s will give you all the flair you need.DeveloperBFFs Retro Time Travel Fashion was developed by Fabbox Studios.This article was updated on January 21, 20251 Player2DDress UpFashionFreeGirlHTML5KidsMakeupMobileMouse
